item.title: PR Reviews
item.description: Requirements for a PR Reviews Comments

item.title: Workflow
item.description: We commit in branches and open pull requests on the default branch (main|master). New Code Commit to your new branch Open a PR Get some reviews Merge into default branch Merge it, Merge it flowchart LR; A[CODE]--B[REMOTE BRANCH]; B--C[PULL REQUEST]; C--D[REVIEW]; D--E[MERGE]; E--F[DEPLOY];
